Name: Bengan Yes
About the game: Bengan Yes is an action-packed arena fighting game designed for livestreaming. Choose to either let your viewers brawl it out or simulate a clash between thousands of bots. Everyone has an equal chance of winning with both the arena and stats of players being randomized. Twitch interactive Set a custom keyword for your viewers to join a battle to the death, perfect for deciding giveaway winners! Simulate fights Add up to thousands of bots to clash for your own entertainment. Randomized conditions Enter a seed to generate a random arena along with randomized player stats. Music Lifelike - Music by AlexiAction from Pixabay Please Calm My Mind - Music by EvgenyBardyuzha from Pixabay Password infinity - Music by Lesfm from Pixabay Dragon Castle - Music by Makai Symphony Credits Addemannen1 - Main Developer 123meinkratf - 3D Artist lord LucasNagy - Designer & picture maker person August - Marketing & writing steam page person ReeZey - Man of optimizing the game, making all UI and helping with other stuff too :)
